basic.description: In this course, students communicate the results of their research in writing or through an oral presentation.
basic.subject: BSC
basic.title: Directed Independent Study

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L. Pre- or corequisite: BSC 4900.
